**HELP** Hi {name}, welcome to the Telegram Price Bot. Here is the list of supported commands.
/help : show this message /alive : show if bot is active /set_test_mode __true/false__ : enable/disable test mode /is_test_mode : show if test mode is enabled /message_task_start __PERIOD_HOURS MSG_ID MSG__ : start a message task in the current chat (the message shall be in a new line) /message_task_stop __MSG_ID__ : stop the specified message task in the current chat /message_task_stop_all : stop all message tasks in the current chat /message_task_pause __MSG_ID__ : pause the specified message task in the current chat /message_task_resume __MSG_ID__ : resume the specified message task in the current chat /message_task_get __MSG_ID__ : show the message set for the specified message task in the current chat /message_task_set __MSG_ID MSG__ : set the message of the specified message task in the current chat (the message shall be in a new line) /message_task_delete_last_msg __MSG_ID true/false__ : enable/disable the deletion of last messages for the specified message task in the current chat /message_task_info : show the list of active message tasks in the current chat
**STATUS** ✅ The bot is alive.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode enabled.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode disabled.
**TEST MODE** Test mode is currently enabled.
**TEST MODE** Test mode is currently disabled.

**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message task successfully started.
Parameters: - Period: __{period}h__ - Message ID: __{msg_id}__
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message task __{msg_id}__ successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ All message tasks successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message task __{msg_id}__ successfully paused.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message task __{msg_id}__ successfully resumed.
**TASK CONTROL** No message set for task __{msg_id}__.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message successfully set for task __{msg_id}__.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Message task __{msg_id}__ delete last message set to: {flag}.
**TASKS INFO** Number of active tasks in this chat: **{tasks_num}** Tasks list: {tasks_list}
**TASKS INFO** No task is active in this chat.
Hi! Thanks for choosing the **Telegram Periodic Message Bot**. Use __/help__ to see the list of supported commands. Do not forget to **make me administrator of the group** or I won't work properly.

**ERROR** ❌ You are not authorized to use the command.
**ERROR** ❌ This command can be executed only in the chat group.
**ERROR** ❌ Invalid parameters.
**ERROR** ❌ Invalid message.

**ERROR** ❌ Period shall be between 1 and 24.
